DoubleVectorProperty.name: ViewTime
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The pipeline update time for this view. This gets passed to all representations added to this view.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This is the cache key used to identify which cache entry to use for rendering when caching is enabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Indicates whether to use cache for subsequent renderings.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewPosition
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the position on this view in the multiview configuration.

IntVectorProperty.name: ViewSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of this view in the multiview configuration.

ProxyProperty.name: Representations
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Representations in this view.

ProxyProperty.name: Cues
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Animation cues for changing parameters.

RenderViewProxy.name: RenderView
RenderViewProxy.label: Render View
RenderViewProxy.Documentation: View proxy for a 3D interactive render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: ShowAnnotation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether to see annotation providing advanced debugging and performance information about each render.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseInteractiveRenderingForScreenshots
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether InteractiveRender() should be used during CaptureWindow calls. Default is to use StillRender().

IntVectorProperty.name: StillRenderImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the reduction-factor to use when for StillRender(). This is typically set to 1, but in some cases with terrible connectivity or really large displays, one may want to use a sub-sampled image even for StillRender(). This is set it number of pixels to be sub-sampled by. Note that image reduction factors have no effect when in built-in mode.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CollectGeometryThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: DEPRECATED: Simply set UseOutlineForLODRendering flag to true, and whenever LOD rendering is employed, we rendering outlines, is possible.

IntVectorProperty.name: ImageReductionFactor
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the reduction-factor to use when for InteractiveRender(). This is set it number of pixels to be sub-sampled by. Note that image reduction factors have no effect when in built-in mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: SuppressRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, this will suppress rendering into a window yet still perform all the updates that normally happen as a part of rendering.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RemoteRenderThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The threshold used to determine if the compositing should be used for rendering. The value is rendering-geometry size in MBs.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODThreshold
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the memory size threshold above which LOD will be used while rendering interactively. The value is rendering-geometry size in MBs.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODResolution
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the LOD resolution. 0 implies lowest level or detail, while 1 implies maximum level of detail.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseOutlineForLODRendering
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, this overrides the LODResolution. In that case, when using LOD for rendering, if possible, the data is rendered as outlines.

StringVectorProperty.name: CompressorConfig
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Used to configure the image compression used for client-server image transfer when doing interactive renders.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle the visibility of the axes showing the center of rotation in the scene.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Toggle the visibility of the axes showing the viewing direction.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationAxesInteractivity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Allows repositioning of the orientation axes.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CenterOfRotation
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Center of rotation for the interactor.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: RotationFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Rotation speed factor for the interactor. This default rotation speed is multipied by this factor. Default value is 1.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NonInteractiveRenderDelay
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the delay (in seconds) after an interactive render before switching to a full-res render.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableRenderOnInteraction
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set whether the view must render automatically on interaction. If application wants to manage renders explicitly, set this to 0 (Off). 1 (On) by default.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera3DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the interactions mode for 3D interaction. The values are specified in order as (left button, middle button, right button), and repeated for shift key and control key modifiers.

IntVectorProperty.name: Camera2DManipulators
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the interactions mode for 2D interaction. The values are specified in order as (left button, middle button, right button), and repeated for shift key and control key modifiers.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera2DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 2D interaction.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Camera3DMouseWheelMotionFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the wheel motion factor for 3D interaction.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseLight
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable the LightKit.

IntVectorProperty.name: HiddenLineRemoval
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use a hidden line removal technique to hide wireframe surfaces that are occluded by other wireframe surfaces. Note that this is disabled when rendering distributed geometry in parallel.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfPeels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of depth peeling, define the maximum number of peeling layers. Initial value is 4. A special value of 0 means no maximum limit. It has to be a positive value.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseToneMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable / Disable tone mapping. Tone mapping is a technique to preserve the colors when the scene is too dark or too bright. Refer to the settings for more configuration.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Exposure
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the exposure coefficient.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSSAO
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Ambient Occlusion
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable / Disable screen space ambient occlusion.

IntVectorProperty.name: StereoType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the stereo rendering mode to use. In client-server configurations, you may also want to set the ServerStereoType.

IntVectorProperty.name: ServerStereoType
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property allows you to set a different stereo mode for the server processes. Note that the stereo type selected on the client and server must be *compatible*, i.e. if the stereo type on the client side needs 2 renders each frame, the stereo type on the server must do exactly the same, otherwise deadlocks may ensue.

ProxyProperty.name: HiddenRepresentations
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property is meant for adding/removing representation secretly. e.g. 3D widgets etc. This property is not saved in states nor it recorded by undo-redo.

ProxyProperty.name: HiddenProps
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property is meant for adding/removing props secretly. e.g. 3D widgets etc. This property is not saved in states nor it recorded by undo-redo.

IntVectorProperty.name: CameraParallelProjection
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/disable parallel projection mode.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSkyboxBackground
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable skybox texture.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseEnvironmentLighting
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable skybox light contribution. This feature is only compatible with PBR interpolation.

Property.name: CaptureZBuffer
Property.Documentation: A helper function to get the Z buffer from a RenderView.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaxClipBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the most conservative clipping range.

Property.name: CaptureValuesFloat
Property.Documentation: A helper function to get the FLOATING_POINT value buffer from the vtkValuePass.

IntVectorProperty.name: LockBounds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: A helper function to force consistent Z buffer captures from a RenderView.

Property.name: BeginValueCapture
Property.Documentation: Initiates a render state where RGB colors encode values from a particular array.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawCells
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: RGB colors will come directly from a cell (1) or point (0) aligned array.

StringVectorProperty.name: ArrayNameToDraw
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: RGB colors will come directly from a named array.

IntVectorProperty.name: ArrayNumberToDraw
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: RGB colors will come directly from the numbered array.

IntVectorProperty.name: ValueRenderingMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select rendering mode of the value pass (either INVERTIBLE_LUT (1) or FLOATING_POINT (2)).

IntVectorProperty.name: ValueRenderingModeGet
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get active rendering mode of the value pass (either INVERTIBLE_LUT (1) or FLOATING_POINT (2)).

IntVectorProperty.name: ArrayComponentToDraw
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: RGB colors will come directly from the numbered component of the array.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScalarRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Map linearly between the min and max values to produce RGB colors.

Property.name: EndValueCapture
Property.Documentation: Terminates the render state where RGB colors encode values from a particular array and returns to normal behavior.

Property.name: StartCaptureLuminance
Property.Documentation: Initiates a render state where lighting contributions are encoded into RGB.

Property.name: StopCaptureLuminance
Property.Documentation: Terminates the render state where lighting contributions are encoded into RGB.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableOSPRay
IntVectorProperty.label: Enable Ray Tracing
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Switches between rasterization and ray tracing.

StringVectorProperty.name: OSPRayRendererType
StringVectorProperty.label: Back End
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Selects a specific ray traced rendering engine.

IntVectorProperty.name: Shadows
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls whether OSPRay raycaster back end casts shadow rays or not.

IntVectorProperty.name: AmbientSamples
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the number of occlusion query rays that OSPRay raycaster sends at each intersection.

IntVectorProperty.name: SamplesPerPixel
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of primary rays that ray tracers shoot per pixel.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaxFrames
IntVectorProperty.label: Progressive Passes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of render passes ray tracers take to improve image quality. Note, this requires turning on the 'Enable Streaming' setting in Edit->Preferences/Settings.

IntVectorProperty.name: RouletteDepth
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the path traced recursion depth at which to start Russian roulette termination.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: VolumeAnisotropy
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the tendency for light to scatter back towards (negative) or away from (positive) the light source within path traced volumes.

IntVectorProperty.name: Denoise
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Controls whether to denoise images. This option will have no effect without a denoiser library and until progressive passes or samples per pixel exceeds four.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LightScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Diminish or amplify all lights in the scene.

IntVectorProperty.name: OSPRayTemporalCacheSize
IntVectorProperty.label: Temporal Cache Size
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the size of the timestep cache that speeds up flip book animation in ray tracers.

IntVectorProperty.label: Background mode
IntVectorProperty.name: BackgroundMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Background behavior for path tracers. Backplate does not move or affect materials. Environment does.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundNorth
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Environment North
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets north pole for gradient and image environmental background in path tracers.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: BackgroundEast
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Environment East
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets east direction for image environmental background in path tracers.

ProxyProperty.name: OSPRayMaterialLibrary
ProxyProperty.label: OSPRay Material Library
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Container for a set of material specifications.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SlicePosition
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the slice position.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SliceIncrements
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: When interacting using the thumb wheel, set the increments to use to change the slice position.

ContextViewProxy.name: XYChartView
ContextViewProxy.label: Line Chart View
ContextViewProxy.Documentation: This is the proxy for the XY line chart view.

ContextViewProxy.name: XYPointChartView
ContextViewProxy.label: Point Chart View

ContextViewProxy.label: Parallel Coordinates View
ContextViewProxy.Documentation: This is the proxy for parallel coordinates chart view.

PlotMatrixViewProxy.Documentation: This is the proxy for the plot matrix view.

IntVectorProperty.name: CellFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the font size for cells in the spreadsheet.

IntVectorProperty.name: HeaderFontSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the font size for row and column headers in the spreadsheet.

IntVectorProperty.name: SelectionOnly
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to 1, this representations shows only the selected cells (or points). The change will effect only after calling Update(). Note that changing this will clean all cache.

IntVectorProperty.name: GenerateCellConnectivity
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Generation of the cell connectivity.

IdTypeVectorProperty.name: BlockSize
IdTypeVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the number of rows that fit within one block. The output of this filter will have at most BlockSize rows.

StringVectorProperty.name: HiddenColumnLabels
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This is list of labels for columns that will be hidden in the view i.e. these columns won't be show in the GUI or exported when exporting the view.

IntVectorProperty.name: FieldAssociation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the attribute data to pass.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: PVRepresentationBase
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ParaView's default representation for showing any type of dataset in the render view.

InputProperty.name: Selection
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the selection.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

IntVectorProperty.name: SelectionVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for the selection, if any.

StringVectorProperty.name: RepresentationTypesInfo
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Property that lists the available representation types. This is used by the domain for "Representation" to setup the list of types available correctly.

StringVectorProperty.name: Representation
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the type for the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: GeometryRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: ParaView's default representation for showing any type of dataset in the render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UnstructuredGridBaseRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Deprecated: This is no longer needed. Simply use UniformGridVolumeRepresentation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UnstructuredGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show unstructured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

PVRepresentationProxy.name: StructuredGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show structured grid as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume

InputProperty.name: Input

PVRepresentationProxy.name: UniformGridRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show image data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume/Slice.

InputProperty.name: Input

PVRepresentationProxy.name: AMRRepresentation
PVRepresentationProxy.Documentation: This representation is used to show AMR data as Surface/Outline/Points/Wireframe/Volume.

InputProperty.name: Input

RepresentationProxy.name: UniformGridVolumeRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for rendering a vtkImageData as volume.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSeparateOpacityArray
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is on, the Opacity Array will be used to determine the point gaussian sprites.

StringVectorProperty.name: OpacityArrayName
StringVectorProperty.label: Volume Opacity Array
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the input array to map to opacity.

IntVectorProperty.name: OpacityComponent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the component of the array to be used for opacity.

IntVectorProperty.name: Shade
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable shading.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping. Otherwise, when up to 4 component scalars are present, the components are clamped to a valid color interval (0-255 for an integral type and 0.0-1.0 for a floating point type) and then directly used as color.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlendMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies how the samples should be blended

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Isosurfaces
DoubleVectorProperty.name: IsosurfaceValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the values at which to display isosurfaces and also the number of such values.

ProxyProperty.label: Slice Type
ProxyProperty.name: SliceFunction
ProxyProperty.Documentation: This property sets the parameters of the slice function.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCropping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies if the cropping is enabled.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CroppingOrigin
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the cropping origin.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CroppingScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the cropping scale.

RepresentationProxy.name: OutlineRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for showing an outline for any dataset.

RepresentationProxy.name: FeatureEdgesRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for showing feature edges for any dataset.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to True, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping. Otherwise, when up to 4 component scalars are present, the components are clamped to a valid color interval (0-255 for an integral type and 0.0-1.0 for a floating point type) and then directly used as color.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup-table to use to map data array to colors. Lookuptable is only used with MapScalars to ON.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: GaussianRadius
DoubleVectorProperty.label: Gaussian Radius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The radius of the gaussian blur for each point.

IntVectorProperty.name: CustomTriangleScale
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the scale of the triangle geometry drawn, automatically set when using preset but needed with custom shader code

StringVectorProperty.label: Custom Shader Code
StringVectorProperty.name: CustomShader
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the custom shader code

IntVectorProperty.name: Emissive
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should the splat be emissive like a light source or not. For cosmology emissive should be on. For scanned point clouds typically it would be off.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScaleByArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Scale Array
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is on, the Scale Array will be used to determine that radii of the gaussians. Otherwise the Default Radius will be used.

StringVectorProperty.name: SetScaleArray
StringVectorProperty.label: Gaussian Scale Array
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the input array to scale the splats by.

IntVectorProperty.name: ScaleArrayComponent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the component of the array to be used for scaling.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseScaleFunction
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Scale Transfer Function
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is enabled, the Scale Transfer Function is used to map the scale values of the Scale Array. Otherwise, the scale values are used as-is.

ProxyProperty.name: ScaleTransferFunction
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the piecewise function used to map data array to sprite size. ScaleTransferFunction is only used if ScaleByArray is set.

IntVectorProperty.name: OpacityByArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Use Opacity Array
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is on, the Opacity Array will be used to determine the point gaussian sprites.

StringVectorProperty.name: OpacityArray
StringVectorProperty.label: Gaussian Opacity Array
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This property specifies the name of the input array to map to point opacity.

IntVectorProperty.name: OpacityArrayComponent
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This property indicates the component of the array to be used for opacity.

ProxyProperty.name: OpacityTransferFunction
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the piecewise function used to map data array to sprite opacity. OpacityTransferFunction is only used if ScaleByArray is set and OpacityArray is also given.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Opacity
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The opacity to use when rendering the model.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge color. This color is used to draw the edge for the polygonal data when EdgeVisibility is on.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DiffuseColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The diffuse color of the model

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SpecularColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The specular color of the model

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: In case of multiblock datasets, choose the index of the dataset to volume render. The index must point to an unstructured grid dataset. If the input is not a multiblock dataset then this index is ignored.

Otherwise, when up to 4 component scalars are present, the components are clamped to a valid color interval (0-255 for an integral type and 0.0-1.0 for a floating point type) and then directly used as color.

StringVectorProperty.name: SelectMapper
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Select the volume mapper to use for Volume rendering.

IntVectorProperty.name: SamplingDimensions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: How many linear samples we want along each axis

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDataPartitions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to redistribute the data when actor is translucent. Default is false.

RepresentationProxy.name: ImageSliceRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show 2D images. If the input image has 3D extents, then this representation shows a single Z slice.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation. Must be a vtkImageData producer.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: Slice
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the current slice number. Slice number is used to load a 2D slice from a 3D input image. If the input image is 2D, then the slice number if ignored. The direction of the slice is determined by SliceMode.

IntVectorProperty.label: Slice Direction
IntVectorProperty.name: SliceMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the direction of slicing to obtain a 2D slice from a 3D image.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to True, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping. Otherwise, when up to 4 component scalars are present, the components are clamped to a valid color interval (0-255 for an integral type and 0.0-1.0 for a floating point type) and then directly used as color.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseXYPlane
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, the image slice is always rendered in the XY plane (Z==0) irrespective of the image bounds. Default if Off.

RepresentationProxy.name: SurfaceRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: BackfaceRepresentation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose the representation type for the backface.

RepresentationProxy.name: Glyph3DRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

InputProperty.label: Glyph Type
InputProperty.name: GlyphType
InputProperty.Documentation: Specify the source objects.

IntVectorProperty.name: MeshVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the visibility of the original mesh.

IntVectorProperty.name: Scaling
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable scaling of source geometry.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScaleFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property will be used as a multiplier for scaling the glyphs before adding them to the output.

IntVectorProperty.name: Orient
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If this property is set to 1, the glyphs will be oriented based on the selected orientation vector array.

IntVectorProperty.name: OrientationMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Orientation mode indicates if the OrientationArray provides the direction vector for the orientation, the rotations around each axes or the quaternion in WXYZ format. Default is DIRECTION.

IntVectorProperty.name: Masking
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Tells the mapper to skip glyphing input points that haves false values in the mask array. If there is no mask array (id access mode is set and there is no such id, or array name access mode is set and the there is no such name), masking is silently ignored. A mask array is a vtkBitArray with only one component.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseGlyphTable
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, the source index array would be used to select the glyph source. If not, only the first source input will be used to generate the glyph. It's a prerequisite to enable UseCompositeGlyphTable.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCompositeGlyphTable
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When true, the glyph data is expected to be a multiblock dataset, where each top-level node contains a separate glyph which may be selected by a point data array on the input dataset. UseGlyphTable must be enabled as a prerequisite.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseGlyphCullingAndLOD
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When true, culling pass and level of details are enabled. The culling pass detects points outside the frustum view and LOD displays decimated geometry based on the distance between the camera and the instance. This allows to render a higher number of glyphs at interactive rate. This feature works only with OpenGL driver >= 4.0.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: LOD Values
DoubleVectorProperty.name: LODValues
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Configure LODs. The first value is the distance after which it is enabled. The second value is the decimation parameter (0 displays full geometry, 1 displays only a point) The maximum number of LODs depends on the GPU capacity.

IntVectorProperty.label: Color By LOD Index
IntVectorProperty.name: ColorByLODIndex
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When true, each level of detail has its own color based on its index. It can be useful to correctly configure the levels of details.

RepresentationProxy.name: DataLabelRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation used to add labels to points/cells of any dataset.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for this representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: MaximumNumberOfLabels
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The maximum number of point labels shown. If the dataset contains more points that this number, a random subset of this size is chosen and labeled.

StringVectorProperty.name: PointLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This should be a printf-style format string. By default, the mapper will try to print each component of the tuple using a sane format: d for integers, f for floats, g for doubles, ld for longs, et cetera. If you need a different format, set it here. You can do things like limit the number of significant digits, add prefixes/suffixes, basically anything that printf can do. Leave empty to auto select an appropriate format.

StringVectorProperty.name: CellLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This should be a printf-style format string. By default, the mapper will try to print each component of the tuple using a sane format: d for integers, f for floats, g for doubles, ld for longs, et cetera. If you need a different format, set it here. You can do things like limit the number of significant digits, add prefixes/suffixes, basically anything that printf can do. Leave empty to auto select an appropriate format.

If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

IntVectorProperty.name: RenderLinesAsTubes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, all lines are rendered as 3D tubes, if supported by OpenGL driver.

IntVectorProperty.name: RenderPointsAsSpheres
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, all points are rendered as 3D spheres, if supported by OpenGL driver.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UserTransform
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: In addition to the instance variables such as position and orientation, you can add an additional transformation for your own use. This transformation is concatenated with the actor's internal transformation, which you implicitly create through the use of Position, Origin, Orientation. The value is 4x4 matrix for the linear transform to use.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Position
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Keeps axes synced with actor transforms.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Scale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Keeps axes synced with actor transforms.

StringVectorProperty.name: SeriesPlotCorner

StringVectorProperty.name: SeriesLabelPrefix
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify a string to prefix to the **SeriesLabel** (**Legend Name**) for each of series being plotted. This will get prefixed to the labels (legend names) specified for each of the series individually via the **Series Parameters**.

StringVectorProperty.name: LastPresetName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Dummy property containing last color preset name. The property widget can set it when a preset is applied, and the domain can read it when a default color is requested.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseColorMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Use color mapping for the histogram.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: HistogramColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Sets the color for the histograms.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Sets the lookup table to use for scalar mapping.

IntVectorProperty.name: BinCount
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property specifies the number of bins for the histogram.

IntVectorProperty.name: Component
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: The value of this property specifies the array component from which the histogram should be computed.

IntVectorProperty.name: CenterBinsAroundMinAndMax
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, first and last bin will be centered around the minimum and the maximum values of the data. By default, set to false.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseCustomBinRanges
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true, CustomBinRanges will be used instead of using the full range for the selected array. By default, set to false.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomBinRanges
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set custom bin ranges to use. These are used only when UseCustomBinRanges is set to true.

IntVectorProperty.name: HistogramLineStyle
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the line style to use for drawing a border around the histogram bins.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

RepresentationProxy.name: RulerSourceRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation proxy used to show a ruler.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Data input for the representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: LabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: This should be a printf-style format string. You can do things like limit the number of significant digits, add prefixes/suffixes, basically anything that printf can do. An empty string or a string without the % symbol results in no label.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Scale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Scale factor applied to the global coordinate distance. Used to convert between the units used in the data set global coordinate distance to desired units. Example: convert from inches to centimeters by setting this value to 0.3937.

IntVectorProperty.name: RulerMode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Check to enable "ruler mode", where ticks are placed at increments defined by the Graduation property.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfTicks
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the number of major ruler ticks. Note: the number of ticks is the number between the two handle endpoints.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Graduation
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the graduation, or the spacing of the ruler tick marks. Spacing is defined in the scaled global coordinate distance (see the Scale property). For example, if data is defined in terms of inches and the Scale property is set to display distances in centimeters, this property defines the spacing of tick marks in terms of centimeters.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AxisColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the color of the ruler.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: AxisLineWidth
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the line width of the ruler in screen units.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Frustum
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify the corners of the outline when in Oriented mode, the values are supplied as 8*3 double values.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of the representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.label: Translation
DoubleVectorProperty.name: Position
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axes origin position.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Scale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axes bounds transform scale.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Orientation
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axes bounds transform orientation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DataBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Get the polar axes transformed bounds.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableCustomBounds
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activate the use of polar axes custom bounds.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomBounds
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axes custom bounds.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableCustomRange
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Activate the use of polar axes custom range.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: CustomRange
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axes custom range.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of polar axis.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialAxesVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set all radial axes visibility.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawRadialGridlines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of radial grid lines.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarArcsVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set all polar arcs visibility.

IntVectorProperty.name: DrawPolarArcsGridlines
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of polar arcs grid lines.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfRadialAxes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of radial axes, If value is 0 (the default), the number of radial axes is automatically calculated.

IntVectorProperty.name: AutoSubdividePolarAxis
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Automatically compute the number of polar axis ticks and tick size. If true, will override NumberOfPolarAxisTicks, PolarAxisMajorTickSize, LastRadialAxisMajorTickSize, ArcMajorTickSize properties.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfPolarAxis
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of polar axis and of course polar axis ticks, If value is 0 (the default), the number of polar axis tick is automatically calculated. ignored if AutoSubdividePolarAxis is true.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MinimumRadius
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the minimum radius, Maximum radius is automatically computed.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MinimumAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the minimum angle.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: MaximumAngle
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the maximum angle.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialAxesOriginToPolarAxis
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If On, the radial axes are drawn from the angle of the polar Axis (i.e. MinimumAngle) and continue counterclockwise with the step DeltaAngleRadialAxes. if Off, the start angle is 0.0.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Ratio
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar ellipse ratio.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Polar Axis color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarArcsColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Polar Arcs color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LastRadialAxisColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Last Radial Axis color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SecondaryPolarArcsColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Secondary Polar Arcs color.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: SecondaryRadialAxesColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the Secondary Radial Axes color.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisTitleVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of polar axis title.

StringVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisTitle
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axis title.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisTitleLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of polar axis title.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarLabelVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility of polar axis label.

StringVectorProperty.name: PolarLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axis label format.

IntVectorProperty.name: PolarLabelExponentLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of exponent.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialLabelVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set radial label visibility.

StringVectorProperty.name: RadialLabelFormat
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar radial label format.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialLabelLocation
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the location of radial labels.

IntVectorProperty.name: RadialUnitsVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Show radial units in labels (degrees).

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ScreenSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the screen size to use, which impact label and title relative location to the axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: EnableDistanceLOD

IntVectorProperty.Documentation: If On, the ticks are drawn from the angle of the polar Axis (MinimumAngle) and continue counterclockwise with the step Delta Angle Major/Minor. If Off, the start angle is 0.0

IntVectorProperty.name: AxisMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set polar axis and last radial axis minor tick visibility.

IntVectorProperty.name: ArcTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set polar arc tick visibility.

IntVectorProperty.name: ArcMinorTickVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set polar arc minor tick visibility.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DeltaAngleMajor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the delta between major ticks on last arc.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: DeltaAngleMinor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the delta between minor and major ticks on last arc.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisMajorTickSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axis major tick size, If value is 0 (the default), tick size is automatically calculated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisTickRatioSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the polar axis size ratio between major and minor ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisMajorTickThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness of polar axis major ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: PolarAxisTickRatioThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness ratio between major and minor ticks of polar axis.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LastRadialAxisMajorTickSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the last radial axis major tick size, If value is 0 (the default), tick size is automatically calculated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LastRadialAxisTickRatioSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the last radial axis size ratio between major and minor ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LastRadialAxisMajorTickThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness of last radial axis major ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: LastRadialAxisTickRatioThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness ratio between major and minor ticks of last radial axis.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ArcMajorTickSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the arc major tick size, If value is 0 (the default), tick size is automatically calculated.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ArcTickRatioSize
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the arc size ratio between major and minor ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ArcMajorTickThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness of arc major ticks.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ArcTickRatioThickness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the thickness ratio between major and minor ticks of arc.

IntVectorProperty.name: Use2DMode
IntVectorProperty.label: Use 2D Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the use of 2D Mode for all axes.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseLogAxis
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the use of Log axis.

RepresentationProxy.name: AMROutlineRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for showing an outline for AMR dataset that is streaming capable.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UserTransform
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: In addition to the instance variables such as position and orientation, you can add an additional transformation for your own use. This transformation is concatenated with the actor's internal transformation, which you implicitly create through the use of Position, Origin, Orientation. The value is 4x4 matrix for the linear transform to use.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Luminosity
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Makes the object emit light. Only takes effect with OSPRay's path traced renderer.

IntVectorProperty.name: RenderLinesAsTubes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, all lines are rendered as 3D tubes, if supported by OpenGL driver.

RepresentationProxy.name: AMRVolumeRepresentation
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation for rendering Overlapping AMR as volume.

InputProperty.name: Input
InputProperty.Documentation: Set the input to the representation.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: Shade
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable/Disable shading.

IntVectorProperty.name: NumberOfSamples
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of samples used to create an uniform grid from the AMR.

IntVectorProperty.name: StreamingRequestSize
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the number of blocks to request at a given time on a single process when streaming.

RepresentationProxy.name: SurfaceRepresentationBase
RepresentationProxy.Documentation: Representation to show any dataset in a 3D render view.

IntVectorProperty.name: Visibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Get/Set the visibility of the representation.

IntVectorProperty.name: ForceUseCache
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: ForcedCacheKey
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Typically UseCache and CacheKey are updated by the View and representations cache based on what the view tells it. However in some cases we may want to force a representation to cache irrespective of the view (e.g. comparative views). In which case these ivars can up set. If ForcedCacheKey is true, it overrides UseCache and CacheKey. Instead, ForcedCacheKey is used.

StringVectorProperty.name: ColorArrayName
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the array to color with. One must specify the field association and the array name of the array. If the array is missing, scalar coloring will automatically be disabled.

IntVectorProperty.name: CoordinateShiftScaleMethod
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Options for normalizing the point coordinates. The points are sent to the GPU as float data which can result in resolution issues due to the limited precision of float. VTK includes a variety of methods to normalize the point coordinates prior to sending them to the GPU. Auto shift scale is a good setting that should work for most datasets. Focal point shift scale works based on the current camera viewpoint which makes it the most robust setting but it will renormalize the data occasionally as the camera's settings change which requires reuploading the data to the GPU so there may be a performance cost.

StringVectorProperty.label: Texture Coordinates
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectTCoordArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the texture coordinates array used for texture mapping.

StringVectorProperty.label: Normal Array
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectNormalArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the normal array used for smooth shading.

StringVectorProperty.label: Tangent Array
StringVectorProperty.name: SelectTangentArray
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the tangent coordinates array used for normal mapping.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Roughness
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set how rough is the surface

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Metallic
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set metalness of the surface. It is usually either 0 or 1 but any value is valid.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeTint
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: For metals only. Set the tint at grazing angles.

ProxyProperty.name: Texture
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the diffuse color texture.

IntVectorProperty.name: RepeatTextures
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should textures be clamped or repeated when texture coordinates go outside the range of 0 to 1.

IntVectorProperty.name: InterpolateTextures
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When sampling a texture should linear interpolations be used. If false then nearest neighbor sampling will be used.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseMipmapTextures
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Should mipmaps be used for textures. Mipmaps are espcially useful when working with large detailed textures or situations where you might be viewing a texture map from far away.

ProxyProperty.name: BaseColorTexture
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the base color (also called albedo) texture. It will define the diffuse color for a non metallic surface or the specular color for a metallic surface.

ProxyProperty.name: MaterialTexture
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the material texture. This texture encodes occlusion, roughness and metalness on the red, green, blue channel respectively.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: OcclusionStrength
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the ambient occlusion strength of the material texture.

ProxyProperty.name: NormalTexture
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the normal mapping texture.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: NormalScale
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the scale of normal mapping deviation.

ProxyProperty.name: EmissiveTexture
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the emissive texture.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EmissiveFactor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the factor of the red, green, blue channels of the emissive texture.

IntVectorProperty.name: FlipTextures
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable texture coordinate flip on Y axis. Depending on some format specification, the origin of the texture could be either at the bottom left or the top left of the image.

IntVectorProperty.name: RenderLinesAsTubes
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, all lines are rendered as 3D tubes, if supported by OpenGL driver.

IntVectorProperty.name: RenderPointsAsSpheres
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set, all points are rendered as 3D spheres, if supported by OpenGL driver.

IntVectorProperty.name: Triangulate
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Triangulate the geometry internally to avoid rendering issues of non-convex polygons. This feature has a processing and memory cost, it should be enabled only when needed.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseShaderReplacements
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable the use of shader replacements.

StringVectorProperty.name: ShaderReplacements
StringVectorProperty.Documentation:
Specify shader replacements using a Json string. The Json string can be a single node or an array of nodes with the following properties:
"type": specifies the type of shader the replacement is about. It can be either "vertex", "fragment" or "geometry".
"original": specifies the original string to be replaced in the shader code. This string is generally a pattern defined by the mapper vtkOpenGLPolyDataMapper at specific locations of the shader GLSL source code.
"replacement": specifies the replacement string in GLSL source code. Note that the Json parser supports multiple lines entries.
Example of a simple shader replacement (draw all the fragments in full red color without any shading consideration):
{
"type": "fragment",
"original": "//VTK::Light::Impl",
"replacement": "gl_FragData[0]=vec4(1.0,0.0,0.0,1.0);"
}

DoubleVectorProperty.name: Luminosity
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Makes the object emit light. Only takes effect with OSPRay's path traced renderer.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: EdgeColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the edge color. This color is used to draw the edge for the polygonal data when EdgeVisibility is on.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: InteractiveSelectionColor
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the preselection color. This color is used to draw the edge of the current preselection.

DoubleVectorProperty.name: UserTransform
DoubleVectorProperty.Documentation: In addition to the instance variables such as position and orientation, you can add an additional transformation for your own use. This transformation is concatenated with the actor's internal transformation, which you implicitly create through the use of Position, Origin, Orientation. The value is 4x4 matrix for the linear transform to use.

ProxyProperty.name: LookupTable
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the lookup-table to use to map data array to colors. Lookuptable is only used with MapScalars to ON.

IntVectorProperty.name: UseSeparateColorMap
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: By default, ParaView shares a single color map among all datasets colored by arrays that have the same name. When this option is enabled, the active dataset will be assigned a separate color map not shared by other datasets.

IntVectorProperty.name: MapScalars
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When enabled, LookupTable will always be used for scalar mapping. Otherwise, when up to 4 component scalars are present, the components are clamped to a valid color interval (0-255 for an integral type and 0.0-1.0 for a floating point type) and then directly used as color.

IntVectorProperty.name: MultiComponentsMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Enable multi components mapping. For a two-components array, the first component is mapped to the color, the second component is mapped to the opacity. For a four-components array, the first, second and third components are used as RGB values and the fourth component is mapped to the opacity. Only available when MapScalars is ON. This feature forces "Separate Color Map" and scales the color and the opacity range with the correct component.

IntVectorProperty.name: InterpolateScalarsBeforeMapping
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: When set to true (default), texture coordinates are sent to and interpolated by the graphics card. This is equivalent with interpolating scalars and then mapping them to obtain colors between points. Otherwise, colors are sent to and interpolated by the graphics card.

IntVectorProperty.name: SeamlessU
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This parameter prevents seams in the U direction in the parameterization space. It should be used when using a cylindrical or toroidal parameterization on the surface.

IntVectorProperty.name: SeamlessV
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: This parameter prevents seams in the V direction in the parameterization space. It should be used when using a cylindrical or toroidal parameterization on the surface.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlockVisibility
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the visibility for blocks. In Python, assign the value from an interleaved list of block indices and visibilities, e.g., [index1, visibility1, index2, visibility2, ...]. The list does not need to contain all block indices.

DoubleMapProperty.name: BlockColor
DoubleMapProperty.Documentation: Set the colors for blocks. In Python, assign the value from a dictionary of the form {index1:, [r1, g1, b1], index2: [r2, g2, b2], ...}.

DoubleMapProperty.name: BlockOpacity
DoubleMapProperty.Documentation: Set the opacity for blocks. In Python, assign the value from a dictionary of the form {index1:, [a1], index2: [a2], ...}.

IntVectorProperty.name: BlockColorsDistinctValues
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Determines the number of distinct values in vtkBlockColors. This array is added to each block if the dataset is a composite dataset. The array has one value set to (blockIndex % BlockColorsDistinctValues)

IntVectorProperty.name: UseDataPartitions
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Specify whether or not to redistribute the data when actor is translucent. Default is false.

IntVectorProperty.name: OSPRayUseScaleArray
IntVectorProperty.label: Scaling Mode
IntVectorProperty.Documentation: Choose how the size of each sphere and cylinder is determined.

StringVectorProperty.name: OSPRayScaleArray
StringVectorProperty.label: Scale Array
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Choice of an array for OSPRay implicit points and lines sizes.

ProxyProperty.name: OSPRayScaleFunction
ProxyProperty.label: Scale Function
ProxyProperty.Documentation: Set the piecewise function used to map data array to sprite size. ScaleTransferFunction is only used if ScaleByArray is set.

StringVectorProperty.name: OSPRayMaterial
StringVectorProperty.label: Material
StringVectorProperty.Documentation: Set the material to paint this object with.
